mapper.select: SELECT t.sid AS sid, t.year AS year, t.month AS month, if(((t.count - ifnull(r.sum, 0)) < t.sum), t.count - ifnull(r.sum, 0), t.sum) AS leftsum FROM ( SELECT t.sid, t.year, t.month, t.sum, (SELECT SUM(x.sum) FROM view_sup_month_trade x WHERE concat(x.year, x.month) <= concat(t.year, t.month) AND t.sid = x.sid) AS count FROM view_sup_month_trade t ) AS t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sup_id AS sid, sum(total) AS sum FROM remit_sup GROUP BY sup_id ) AS r ON t.sid = r.sid WHERE ifnull(r.sum, 0) < t.count ORDER BY sid, year, month
